meanings.sent1: She gave the fawniest smile to the teacher to get extra credit.
meanings.sent2: The fawniest student in the class always compliments the teacher.
meanings.sent3: The fawniest puppy wagged its tail eagerly for a treat.
meanings.sent4: Her fawniest behavior towards the boss earned her a promotion.
meanings.sent5: The fawniest kitten purred non-stop to get attention.

meanings.definition: To exhibit excessive admiration or affection
meanings.sent1: He would fawniest over his favorite celebrity whenever they visited.
meanings.sent2: The fans would fawniest over the singer at every concert.
meanings.sent3: The toddler would fawniest over their new toy, hugging it tightly.
meanings.sent4: She would fawniest over her crush, always complimenting them.
meanings.sent5: The employee would fawniest over the boss, hoping for a raise.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics of a fawn
meanings.sent1: The fawniest creature in the forest was the baby deer.
meanings.sent2: The fawniest features of the animal made it blend in with the trees.
meanings.sent3: The fawniest costume at the party was a deer outfit.
meanings.sent4: Her fawniest movements mimicked those of a graceful deer.
meanings.sent5: The fawniest figurine on the shelf was a delicate deer sculpture.
